product_name: Burton Mission Smalls Snowboard Bindings - Boys'
long_description: Burton Mission Smalls snowboard bindings bring big brother performance and strength to your little shredder. EVA baseplate cushioning and flexible highbacks make riding these freestyle bindings easy. Single-component, lightweight polycarbonate baseplates are surfy and playful; a forgiving flex meets rugged strength for laid-back cruising. Features toe and heel EVA baseplate padding. Single-component highbacks eliminate hardware to save weight; forward lean and highback rotation adjust independently of each other for a precise fit. Asym Luxstrap(TM) 3D-curved, padded ankle straps feature an asymmetric shape for mobility and lateral support. Primo Capstrap(TM) toe straps eliminate pressure across top of feet; Grip Fit zones offer locked-and-loaded response. Smooth Glide(TM) buckles deliver buttery smooth and reliable ratching power season after season.
